# Huito

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Flavjack/inti/master/pkgdown/favicon/docs.r")

# open https://docs.google.com/document/d/1U_06RwkOWavq2O9CY5j9GRd3_2Ik8OTrfszK-ccbGmQ/edit
```

```{r, eval=T}
file <- "introduction"
dir <- tempdir() %>% chartr("\\", "/", .)
zip <- list.files(path = "."
                  , pattern = paste0(file, ".zip")
                  , full.names = T
                  ) %>% 
  unzip(zipfile = ., exdir = paste0(dir, "/",file) , overwrite = T)

doc <- zip %>% 
  .[grep('.md', .)] %>% 
  readLines(.) %>% 
  gsub("img_", paste0(dir, "/", file, "/img_"), .) %>% 
  writeLines(con = paste0(dir, "/", file, "/doc.Rmd"))
doc <- list.files(paste0(dir, "/", file), pattern = ".Rmd", full.names = T)
```

```{r, eval=F}
file <- "introduction"
zip <- list.files(path = "."
                  , pattern = paste0(file, ".zip")
                  , full.names = T
                  ) %>% 
  unzip(zipfile = ., exdir = paste0(file) , overwrite = T)

doc <- zip %>% 
  .[grep('.md', .)] %>% 
  readLines(.) %>% 
  gsub("img_", paste0(file, "/img_"), .) %>% 
  writeLines(con = paste0(file, "/_doc.Rmd"))

doc <- paste0(file, "/_doc.Rmd")
```
